profile:
Adanac is dedicated to providing its customers with quality roofing and aluminum gutter services backed by strong workmanship and material warranties! Adanac’s roofing capabilities encompass virtually all forms of steep-slope and flat roofing.

We strive to offer our customers the highest level of customer service in an effort to maintain a strong referral base. In doing this, we have succeeded in becoming one of the lower mainland's premier roofing companies.

 Adanac Roofing Supply and Install IKO, CertainTeed and Malarkey asphalt shingles. Synthetic product we supply and Install Davinci,Enviroshake and all types of metal roofs along with Cedar shakes.

profile:
A Glass Act has been providing window cleaning, Gutter cleaning, Gutter repairs, interior Painting, exterior Painting, drywall repairs, chandelier cleaning, pressure washing, power washing, house washing, building cleaning exterior, roof cleaning, roof de-mossing, roof moss control treatments, concrete & Paving stone sealing, post construction cleaning, pre-occupany cleaning and a variety of other building maintenance services in the Vancouver area since 1988. 

****

We are pleased to announce that effective July 1, 2015, all of our cleaning services are now available to residents and business' in the Victoria & the Saanich Peninsula area! 

****

COVID-19 STATEMENT

COVID-19 has been declared a pandemic. Federal, provincial and local governments and their agencies have been announcing daily recommendations and restrictions that affect the everyday lives of every Canadian.

Whereas the health authorities are still stating that the risk of contracting the virus is low to moderate in BC, the health and safety of our staff and customers is a paramount concern for us at A Glass Act Window Cleaners & Building Maintenance.

We would ask that customers postpone in booking any INTERIOR CLEANING appointments with us until such time that the major Canadian health authorities announce that it will be safer for us to be working indoors (in your homes) in a more contained proximity to our customers.  We will continue to provide our EXTERIOR CLEANING services at this time while following the very important social distancing regulations.

In addition, we are requiring our staff to self-isolate if they become ill or if someone in their household becomes ill.  We do look forward to providing you with our exterior Spring cleaning service, to get your home or business looking refreshed and clean for the season.  We know that many of you will be spending more time in your yards, gardens and patios this Spring while staying at home.  We look forward to making your building exteriors cleaner and brighter while we all stay safer and healthy at home!!

Thank you for your understanding and support.

Kirby Koochin
(President)
A Glass Act Window Cleaners and Building Maintenance Ltd.

profile: ProRise Painting Company has built its reputation on being one of Vancouver's most professional contractors. Continuing a family tradition of European Excellence in quality and service, Joseph Halfar and his team specialize in providing quality painting and restoration services. So whether you are a homeowner or business person or need one room or the entire office repainted, you can be assured that ProRise will make sure it's done right the first time. Delivering an enjoyable experience from start to finish, honesty, strong communication, understanding, and high-end workmanship are just some of the company's core values. We also provide drywall and pressure washing services. Be sure to call or email us today to get more information. profile:
21st Century Roofers Ltd. is a family owned and operated local roofing business started in 1978. We are CertainTeed SELECT ShingleMaster, GAF Master Elite and IKO ShieldPro Plus Factory Certified. This means we can offer our clients the BEST WARRANTIES on their roofing project. 

We are centrally located and work anywhere in the Vancouver Lower Mainland and Fraser Valley. No roofing job is to big or small. Give us a chance to earn your business.

Whether re-roofing or new roof for a residential home, condominium, or commercial building we can provide you with top quality roofing products and services.

profile:
Our team has a combined twenty-four years of experience in the home services industry.
We know how important it is to maintain a clean & tidy environment at home for you & your family to enjoy. It is also equally important to maintain the property to avoid expensive repairs down the road.
We also understand all the hard work & long hours it takes to ‘do it yourself’, while we all admire the ‘can do’ attitude sometimes it’s easier to hire the pros. We help achieve a work-life balance for you to spend your time where it counts.
Your house is your home, it’s not some shack to be shined, at Crown Property Services we treat your Home like Royalty!

profile:
Marks roofing has been serving clients, since 2010 in repairing or building their roofing systems. Our corporate office is located in Surrey, Bc to better serve our Lower Mainland clients. 

*****
 
We have been a family-owned and operated and have become branded not just for the quality of our work, but for our honesty, reliability, and commitment towards our clients. We do not just provide the roofing services; we provide you the best guidance to find the most feasible solution for your roofing problems. Whatever the need, Mark  Roofing Ltd is your number one spot to help you in the Lower Mainland area.
 
Our commitment is to provide exceptional service, along with our dedicated workmanship has earned us respect and loyalty of our valued clients.

We have financing options available - please call 778-885-3347

profile:
Wash ME! Property Services is a highly rated property maintenance company servicing BC s Lower Mainland, Fraser Valley, and Maple Ridge for 9+ years. We offer a full spectrum of services for various property types from residential homes, townhouse strata complexes, and commercial retail properties. We specialize in exterior cleaning services from roof to ground (top to bottom). Wash ME is WorkSafe BC certified; bonded company with 5 million liability insurance.

Services include,
Roof and soffit cleaning
Moss & algae removal and treatment
Gutter cleaning
Exterior building cleaning (siding)
Window cleaning
Concrete cleaning
Snow removal
Post construction building exterior wash

Our mission is to make your life easier; helping you preserve and protect your properties value.

Aside from providing services to the highest standards, our top priority is clear communication between ourselves and our customers. We build quality relationships with our customers, providing white glove professional service, and ensuring your property gets the care and attention it deserves.
